name: Downwhirl
description:
The Pirate King has captured your ship! Escape by fighting through waves of enemies and don't forget to upgrade your ship.

Downwhirl is a Roguelite made for the 7DRL challenge 2020.

Programming by spikedog and cannedmoose.

Graphical assets from www.kenney.nl.

Audio by Audio Alchemist and ZStriefel
